visual.name: valuefilter
visual.displayName: Autocomplete Filter (part of the BI-Champ Suite)
visual.description: A rich slicer that includes auto-completion, copy-and-paste list support, and much more: 100+ settings.

dataRoles.name: valsource
dataRoles.description: Provide a textual column that will be treated as the source (primary) for look-up.

dataRoles.name: secval
dataRoles.description: Optionally provide a second value that can be displayed next to the primary value in the suggestion list.

dataRoles.name: sortorder
dataRoles.description: Optionally provide a value that can serve to sort pick list results. (Ascending or descending controlled through settings.)

dataRoles.name: addtooltips
dataRoles.description: Optionally provide one or more values that can be included in tool tips, where applicable.

dataRoles.name: filtersrc
dataRoles.description: Optionally provide a value that can pre-populate the filter items. (Can be a delimited list of values which are expanded as the default filter.)

enumeration.displayName: Fully Loaded: No Match, No Data
Fully Loaded: No Match, All Data
Live Filtering: No Match, No Data
Live Filtering: No Match, All Data
Explicit Sort / Match Favors / Distance / Value
